data.title: RingMapper
data.description: Code for performing RING-MaP and PAIR-MaP analysis
data.name: RingMapper

evidence: "RingMapper & PairMapper automate the detection of correlated modifcation events in mutational profiling (MaP) experiments."

"RingMapper is a flexible code for computing correlations (RINGs) between all nucleotides in an RNA." and "PairMapper is a wrapper for RingMapper that performs PAIR-MaP analysis, i.e. it searches for correlations indicative of secondary structure base pairs."

Installation instructions and usage are given only via cloning/running scripts (e.g., "Compile cython routines by running: python setup.py build_ext --inplace" and direct invocation of ringmapper.py/pairmapper.py), with no mention of package managers or binaries.
